title: Update contact phone numbers in footer

requirements.text: Update the footer contact phone number list in the Layout component to display the three phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, and +917095510215, replacing the existing phone number entry
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays all three phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, and +917095510215
The phone numbers are displayed in a clear, readable format in the contact information section
Each phone number is clickable with a tel: link for mobile convenience
The styling matches the existing footer contact information design

constraints: Do not modify the frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx file structure or navigation elements
Maintain the existing footer design and layout
nonGoals: Changing the ContactInfo component on the Contact page
Adding email addresses or other contact methods
